alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Northern Dona Ana County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:55PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Dona Ana County through 530 PM MDT... At 455 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northeast of Jornada Range, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jornada Range and Portions of Jornada Experimental Range. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Northern Dona Ana County
